}}'''Mega-Mobbo''' is a ginormous golem made in the image of [[Mobbo]].

== Appearance ==
Mega-Mobbo resembles Mobbo, however presented in grayscale and about 70-80 blocks tall, apparently constructed out of [[stone]]. Inside the mouth is what appears to be a control room or booth, where passengers can ride inside of it.

== Powers and abilities ==
Being incredibly large, Mega-Mobbo possesses great strength, being able to squish the [[wither]], a [[ravager]], and an [[Elder Guardian|elder guardian]] by one shot.
